name: Occupation Of States
description:
It's World War Simulator, duel two big countries. In this game every turn will happend random event and after that you can buy marines, tanks, planes and  defense units and research their improvements, do cyber attack by your hackers and if you want use nuke bomb too. You can create a custom maps using map creator and upload custom profile pictures.

This game have 3 game modes and first mode is player vs bot.

Next mod is duel 2 player on 1 computer (the best opinion)

and last mode is duel 2 player over internet using UDP, but this mod can contains bugs, if you want to play  own maps or have custom profile pictures you need to copy all this files to both computer at the same folders. This mode is tested only in local network, so remote connection from other buildings maybe will not work.

And  you can make your own maps with simple creator map, draw map, flags and edit all data about the states
